name: Babel
description: Dislay your content in multiple languages.

separator.label: Separator
separator.info: Enter one or more characters as the separator you will use when writing in Koken to distinguish between languages. Babel will automatically separate languages using these characters so you should choose a combination you will not otherwise want to use.

content_pl.label: Content Plural
content_pl.info: Enter translations for the plural label for 'Content'. The translations should be in the same order as the languages selected above and use the separator entered above. Please note this will overwrite the labels you have entered in Settings.

content_sg.info: Enter translations for the singular label for 'Content'. The translations should be in the same order as the languages selected above and use the separator entered above. Please note this will overwrite the labels you have entered in Settings.
